DatabaseMigration.backupConn: Data Source = benjaminpc;Initial Catalog = master;Integrated Security = true;Connection Timeout=30;Application Name=SQL Poseidon
DatabaseMigration.restoreConn: Data Source = benjaminpc;Initial Catalog = master;Integrated Security = true;Connection Timeout=30;Application Name=SQL Poseidon
DatabaseMigration.fullDBRestoreQuery: MOVE 'TestDB' TO 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL15.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\DATA\TestDB_backupJob.mdf' , MOVE 'TestDB_log' TO 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL15.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\DATA\TestDB_log_backupJob.ldf'
